publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-664 Donald Gorrie: 7:84 Theatre Company-That the Parliament recognises the valuable cultural work of the 7:84 Theatre Company (Scotland) and its positive innovative role in the social inclusion agenda; deeply regrets the decision of the Scottish Arts Council to change the funding structure for 7:84, and calls for the reinstatement of the three years core funding package for the theatre in order that it can have the security to continue with its work.

S2M-664 Donald Gorrie: 7:84 Theatre Company-That the Parliament recognises the valuable cultural work of the 7:84 Theatre Company (Scotland) and its positive innovative role in the social inclusion agenda; deeply regrets the decision of the Scottish Arts Council to change the funding structure for 7:84, and calls for the reinstatement of the three years core funding package for the theatre in order that it can have the security to continue with its work.
S2M-664 7:84 Theatre Company (lodged on 26 November 2003) Carolyn Leckie*, Christine Grahame*, Rosie Kane*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-664 7:84 Theatre Company (lodged on 26 November 2003) Robert Brown*, Frances Curran*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*
S2M-664 7:84 Theatre Company (lodged on 26 November 2003) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-664 7:84 Theatre Company (lodged on 26 November 2003) Brian Adam*
